actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to apply to subscription and solicitation materials of one conservation publication mailed in bulk by each State the lower third-class rate applicable to matter mailed in bulk by qualified non-profit organizations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares that one conservation publication of a State agency which is responsible for the management and conservation of fish and wildlife shall qualify for the reduced postage rates currently in effect for the third-class bulk mail of qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to apply to subscription and solicitation materials of one conservation publication mailed in bulk by each State the lower third-class rate applicable to matter mailed in bulk by qualified non-profit organizations, and for other purposes.
